primary_factors: Severe winter storm warnings in effect
High winds contributing to hazardous conditions
decision_rationale: The combination of current light snow, significant expected accumulation (between 3 to 8 inches), and severe winter storm warnings indicates a high likelihood of hazardous conditions. The forecast includes strong winds that will exacerbate the snow impact, leading to low visibility and dangerous travel conditions. Historical data supports a high snow day rate under similar conditions.
